Pre-Game Insights: Mets lead the series 1-0, and the Phillies have gone 67-12 in games when they scored five or more runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The season series is tied 7-7 between the two teams.
Others: Bryce Harper has 42 doubles and 30 home runs for the Phillies, and Nicholas Castellanos is 15-for-32 with three doubles, a triple, and two home runs over the last 10 games.
Francisco Lindor has 39 doubles, a triple, 33 home runs, and 91 RBI for the Mets, and Mark Vientos is 11-for-40 with a double, two home runs, and seven RBI over the last 10 games.
